message: I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to negotiate.  Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's be fair - I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but I think a 55/45 split is fair.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet in the middle.  I'm willing to accept your previous offer of a 55/45 split, but in my favor.
Let's call it even. A 50/50 split seems like the fairest way to divide the money.
